entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
